entry.title: Dynabrade Raptor 61400 - Raptor Vacuum Electric Portable Vacuum System
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Collectors & Accessories
Price: 2914.49

[shortdesc]
  • Raptor Vac Electric Portable Vacuum System
  • 25 Gallon (94 L), 20 A, 120 V/60 Hz, M-Class, Poly Non-Conductive, Dry Only, N
  • America
  • Electric Portable Vacuum System for use on non-metallic surfaces such as wood, plastics
  • Designed for general source capture and dry cleanup only
  • 7.8' (238 cm) water static lift
  • 125 CFM (3,3521 L/Min) vacuum flow
  • Allows operation of two tools simultaneously
  • Vacuum starts automatically with startup of tool
  • Bypass Motor System uses environmental air to cool the motor and extend vacuum life
  • Industrial polycarbonate canister, 25 gallon (94 liter) capacity
  • This size allows filter to remain at substantial distance from collected debris, reducing clogging and extending motor life.
  • Includes a HEPA H13 Filter with 99.95 % efficiency on 0.3 micron
  • Automatic cleaning of filter
  • By connecting vacuum unit to external air supply, a blast of air is released to filter every 40 seconds of operation, to cyclically clean filter
  • Handy electric outlet on motor head allows for additional versatility in workplace
  • Convenient orange warning light indicates that filter needs replacement
  • Red warning light indicates protection device has been activated to prevent heat overload to motor
  • Connects to optional 61483 Cart
  • This unit requires a NEMA 5-20 Plug/Outlet
  • USA & Canada Certifications: UL Listed, M-Class

  • European Certifications: CE, EAC, M-Class.
  • Included: Two 20' (6 m) Non-Conductive Coaxial Hoses with Integrated Air Lines, ?Y? Connector, Two Composite Couplers, Two Vacuum Hose Swivel Adapters, Two Disposable Collection Bags.
  • Not included optional Cleaning Kit (96558): Vacuum Hose, 6' (1.8 m) length, Curved handle with two extensions, Round brush, Crevice Tool, Coarse nozzle attachment.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Line Raptor
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Collectors & Accessories
    Set Quantity 10

  • 20 Gallon (78 L), 20 A, 120V/60 Hz, M-Class, Stainless Steel-Conductive, Dry Only, N
  • America
  • Designed for general source capture and dry cleanup
  • 7.8' (238 cm) water static lift
  • 125 CFM (3,3521 L/Min) vacuum flow
  • Allows operation of two tools simultaneously
  • Vacuum starts automatically with startup of tool
  • Bypass Motor System uses environmental air to cool the motor and extend vacuum life
  • Heavy-duty stainless steel recovery tank, with 20 gallon (78 liter) capacity for clean filter assurance
  • This size allows filter to remain at substantial distance from collected debris, reducing clogging and extending motor life.
  • Includes a HEPA H13 Filter with 99.95 % efficiency on 0.3 micron
  • Automatic cleaning of filter
  • By connecting vacuum unit to external air supply, a blast of air is released to filter every 40 seconds of operation, to cyclically clean filter
  • Handy electric outlet on motor head allows for additional versatility in workplace
  • Convenient orange warning light indicates that filter needs replacement
  • Red warning light indicates protection device has been activated to prevent heat overload to motor
  • Connects to optional 61483 Cart
  • This unit requires a NEMA 5-20 Plug/Outlet
  • (See picture)
  • USA & Canada Certifications: UL Listed, M-Class

  • European Certifications: CE, EAC, M-Class.
  • Not included optional Cleaning Kit (96558): Vacuum Hose, 6' (1.8 m) length, Curved handle with two extensions, Round brush, Crevice Tool, Coarse nozzle attachment.
  • Included: Two 20' (6 m) Conductive Coaxial Hoses with Integrated Air Lines, ?Y? Connector, Two Composite Couplers, Vacuum Hose Swivel Cuff, Two Disposable Collection Bags.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Line Raptor
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Collectors & Accessories

entry.title: Dynabrade 64350 - 26 Inch W X 36 Inch L (660 mm W X 914 mm L) Metal Capture Downdraft Station
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Collectors & Accessories
Price: 23817.86

[shortdesc]
  • 26 Inch W x 36 Inch L (660 mm W x 914 mm L) Metal Capture Downdraft Station
  • 230 V (AC), 3 Phase, 60 Hz
  • Metal Finishing Station offers a wet filtration system to capture potentially combustible filings and dust in an air/water mixing zone
  • Also offers convenient disposal of slurry
  • Greatly decreases potential flammability of work area, when removing material from volatile substances.
  • 36 Inch (914 mm) Wide x 26 Inch (660 mm) Deep work surface
  • Unique tabletop design not offered by other manufacturers
  • Can be placed on cart for transportability to every work station
  • Accepts 10 Inch (254) Dual Wheel Grinder/Buffer.
  • Water level view port allows operator to set initial water level and monitor level for adjustment
  • Water reservoir and float valve automatically compensate for water evaporation during use.
  • Internal compartments are accessed with no tools required
  • Includes electric light for enhanced visibility.
  • Transparent debris shield available
  • Stainless steel construction
  • No paper filters to replace
  • Grated work surface
  • Powder coat finish
  • GFI protection.
    • [/shortdesc]

Type: Collectors & Accessories

  • 36 Inch W x 60 Inch L (914 mm W x 1,524 mm L) Metal Capture Downdraft Table
  • 230 V (AC), 3 Phase, 60 Hz, Down Exhaust
  • Meets These NFPA Requirements: Interlock Pneumatic Valve with Blower and Time-Delay
  • Tools operate only when Downdraft Table is running
  • Class II, Group E Explosion-Proof Motor
  • Aluminum Top for Non-Spark Work Surface

  • Lockable Fused Power Disconnect
  • Ideal for capturing aluminum and titanium dust
  • Working area of 36 Inch wide x 60 Inch long accommodates large work pieces

  • casters also lock securely into place.
  • Choice of models that direct exhaust down, up, or to the side

  • Includes shields for both sides and back of table.
  • Workpiece capacity / load rating of 2,000 pounds
  • 42 gallon capacity
  • 1,800 CFM at 4 Inch static pressure
